abstract: Oklahoma officials say civil rights group We the People has gathered enough signatures to petition for grand jury investigation of Tulsa County Sherriff's office; group has pushed for removal of Sheriff Stanley Glanz after volunteer deputy Robert Bates fatally shot Eric Harris in April.
lead_paragraph: A petition calling for a grand jury investigation into the Tulsa County sheriff’s office has enough signatures to be sent to a judge, who will decide whether to impanel a jury, officials said Tuesday.

headline.main: Oklahoma: Judge to Consider Request for Inquiry Into Sheriff
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: Judge to Consider Request for Inquiry Into Sheriff

snippet: A petition calling for a grand jury investigation into the Tulsa County sheriff’s office has enough signatures to be sent to a judge, who will decide whether to impanel a jury, officials said Tuesday.
